Text: Guys, this DVD is NTSC, ok? I forgot to mention it. Thanks!

Informação importante:

Ao criar este torrent, coloquei o seguinte comentário:

FRIENDS.2a.TEMPORADA.DVD2.1st season - by CORE-PD-BR

Gostaria de dizer que eu errei. Não é a 2a (segunda) temporada, mas sim a 1a (primeira). Eu errei na hora de colocar o comentário.

Important information:

When creating this torrent, I put a comment on it that says:

FRIENDS.2a.TEMPORADA.DVD2.1st season - by CORE-PD-BR 

I'd like to say that I made a mistake. It is NOT "2a temporada" (wich means, in english, second season). This is "1a temporada" (wich mans, in english, 1st season).

Thanks!
